p: The Fisher's exact test or regression techniques were conducted to compare between proportions, while the Mann Whitney U test or the t-test were used to compare between median or mean values for continuous variables, as appropriate. Binomial logistic regression was used to determine the factors associated with each epidemic, TDR, and clustering. The Bonferroni method was used for multiple testing adjustments. The level of statistical significance was set at 5%. The analyses were performed with the statistical R software v.3.2.1.
